transcription.text: Hello. You have reached Paragon Recruiters. We're glad to hear from you. If you would like to reach Molly Malone, please press 1. For Michael Parrott, please press 2. Hello, this is Michael Parrott with Paragon Recruiters. thank you for calling I'm not available to take your call right now but I would love to hear from you leave a message and I will get back to you as soon as possible have a great day hello Michael it's Jim with PC recruiter I wanted to give you a quick call back I had a message from you last week I think you were interested in learning more about the PCRM and the AI suite now available for PC recruiter talk about details pricing how to get those so thought I'd give you a call back and answer any questions you had. Wanted to see if you had some time to talk tomorrow or Thursday or anything. What works best for you? Give me a quick call or drop me an email. Let me know. Can happily show you around. My direct line is 440-856-0314. That's 440-856-0314. Thanks. We'll talk to you soon. Bye bye.
transcription.summary: Hello.  You have reached Paragon Recruiters.  We're glad to hear from you.
